attributes.title: Mapping Cigarettes, British American Tobacco.
attributes.description: For this assignment, I chose to map the cigarettes available to consumer in Canada by Imperial Tobacco Group, which is now over taken by British American Tobacco (BAT) and are the biggest suppliers in Canada. They have also bought Rothmans Benson & Hedges Ltd., a big Canadian supplier for cigarettes in Canada. Now these are just few locations from where they buy raw tobacco and manufactures and distributes. The whole network is huge and is very difficult to map. They have several locations to manufacture cigarettes and head quarters in all the countries.

attributes.address: Pacific Heliport Services, Vancouver, BC V5Y, Canada

attributes.description: This is another location where Imperial Tobacco Group Ltd. manufature cigrettes after purchasing raw tobacco from diffrent countries.
attributes.title: Cigarette Manufacturing Plant

attributes.description: Ireland is one of the location where cigarretes are manufactured along with other tobacco procuts by Imperial Tobacco Group limited after the purchase of raw dried tobacco leaves from diffrent countries.

attributes.description: Malawi Is the fifth largest producer of tobacco in world, producing 124,301 mt tobacco every year to world market.
attributes.title: Tobacco Farming

attributes.description: United states produces 358,363 mt of tobacco every year and is the fourth largest producer in world contibuting 6.2% of total tobacco produced in world.
attributes.title: Tobacco Farming

attributes.description: Brazil Is a big producer of tobacco after India and produces 551,250 mt of tobacco every year and contributes 9.6% to tobacco production in world.
attributes.title: Tobacco Farming

attributes.description: India is the second largest producer of tobacco in the worl producing 592,000 mt tobacco and contibuting 10.3% to the total tobacco produced in the World.
attributes.title: Tobacco Farming

attributes.description: China is top tobbaco producer in the World At present. Every year china produce 2,079,950 mt (Meteric Tonnes) od tobbaco, which is sold Nationally and internationally to diffrent Tobbaco Manufacturers.
